author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Heat the oil in a small pan and add the garlic, cabbage and tomato.  Cook for 5-8 minutes or until soft. Add the stock and continue to cook for 8-10 minutes.  Finish by adding the parsley to serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  2 cloves garlic, finely chopped,  ½ cabbage, shredded,  ½ tomato, diced,  ½ pint vegetable stock,  handful fresh parsley, chopped
